translation.en: [Optimus] We were once a peaceful race
of intelligent, mechanical beings.
But then came the war
between the Autobots, who fought for freedom,
translation.it: tra gli Autobot, che combattevano per la libertà,

translation.en: and the Decepticons, who dreamt of tyranny.
translation.it: e i Decepticon, che sognavano la tirannia.

translation.en: Overmatched and outnumbered,
our defeat was all but certain.
translation.it: la nostra sconfitta era pressoché certa.

translation.en: But in the war's final days,
translation.it: Ma nei giorni finali della guerra,

translation.en: one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
translation.it: una nave degli Autobot lasciò la battaglia.

translation.en: It was carrying a secret cargo,
which would have changed our planet's fate.
translation.it: che avrebbe cambiato il destino del nostro pianeta.

translation.en: A desperate mission.
Our final hope.
A hope that vanished.
[man 1] One up there. One over there.
And one more down there.
What you got?
[man 2] Impact detected.
We have impact confirmed.
Contact at 2250 GMT.
translation.it: L'impatto è stato confermato. Contatto… DIRETTORE NASA - …alle 22:50 di Greenwich. - Cosa?

translation.en: What?
Get me SecDef on the phone right away.
translation.it: Chiami il Segretario della Difesa. Subito.

translation.en: [man] Mr. McNamara, the President is expecting you.
[Kennedy] Get Bobby in here.
[McNamara] Mr. President, designation, top secret. We believe a UFO has crashed into the moon.
translation.it: L'argomento è top secret. Riteniamo che un UFO sia caduto sulla Luna.

translation.en: We think the Russians are onto it as well.
translation.it: Pensiamo che stiano indagando anche i russi.

translation.en: Well, then you tell NASA to move heaven and earth.
translation.it: Dite alla NASA di smuovere cielo e terra.

translation.en: We need to get to the moon.
[McNamara] We're going to attempt a manned mission.
NASA said it would take five years.
translation.it: La NASA dice che ci vorranno 5 anni.

translation.en: You get there before the Russians.
[Kennedy] I believe that this nation should commit itself
translation.it: Credo che questo Paese debba impegnarsi

translation.en: to achieving the goal,
before this decade is out,
of landing a man on the moon and returning him safely to the Earth.
translation.it: di far atterrare un uomo sulla Luna e farlo tornare sano e salvo sulla Terra.

translation.en: [NASA technician] Ignition sequence start.
Five, four, three...
translation.it: Otto anni dopo. 16 luglio 1969 Cinque… Quattro… Tre… Due… Uno…

translation.en: ...two, one.
All engines running.
Liftoff. We have a liftoff.
Thirty-two minutes past the hour. Liftoff on Apollo 11.
Neil Armstrong reporting Apollo 11 on proper heading.
translation.it: Neil Armstrong riporta che Apollo 11 procede regolarmente.

translation.en: Apollo 11 is on the way,
translation.it: Apollo 11 è in viaggio, grazie a quella

translation.en: riding that pillar of flame
from the Saturn V out there, 250,000 miles away,
translation.it: del Saturno 5, a 250.000 miglia di distanza

translation.en: where the moon is waiting
translation.it: là dove la Luna è in attesa

translation.en: for man's first arrival.
Houston, you're a go for landing. Over.
[Buzz] Forty feet, down two-and-a-half. Picking up some dust.
translation.it: Quaranta piedi, giù a due e mezzo. Spostiamo polvere.

translation.en: Thirty feet, two-and-a-half down. Faint shadow.
translation.it: Trenta piedi, giù a due e mezzo. Ombra poco nitida.

translation.en: Capcom, Flight.
Four forward. Drifting to the right a little.
Down a half.
Contact light.
Okay, engine stop.
[Neil] Houston,
Tranquility Base here.
The Eagle has landed.
[technician] We copy you down, Eagle. You got a bunch of guys about to turn blue. We're breathing again.
translation.it: Allunaggio ricevuto. Ci avete fatto stare col fiato sospeso. Respiriamo di nuovo.

translation.en: [Cronkite] Perhaps 400 million persons are watching this broadcast today
translation.it: Sono forse 400 milioni le persone che seguono oggi la trasmissione

translation.en: of the greatest event in our time,
translation.it: del più grande evento dei nostri tempi e uno dei più grandi eventi

translation.en: and one of the great events of all recorded history.
translation.it: del più grande evento dei nostri tempi e uno dei più grandi eventi della storia dell'umanità.

translation.en: [Neil] I'm at the foot of the ladder.
Okay, I'm gonna step off the LEM now.
That's one small step for man,
one giant leap for mankind.
-Are we good? -[man 1] Yes, sir.
[man 2, over radio] Unofficial time on the first step, 109--
translation.it: Ora non ufficiale del primo passo, 109…

translation.en: [technician] Apollo 11? This is Houston, over.
Eagle, we're getting a signal interference. Do you copy?
translation.it: Aquila, c'è un'interferenza sul segnale. Ricevete?

translation.en: [Cronkite] We now have had confirmation
of loss of signal from the Apollo 11.
translation.it: della perdita del segnale da Apollo 11. Al momento, si trova sulla faccia nascosta della Luna.

translation.en: The Apollo 11 is, at the moment, on the far side of the moon.
translation.it: da Apollo 11. Al momento, si trova sulla faccia nascosta della Luna.

translation.en: Neil, you are dark on the rock.
Mission is a go.
We have 21 minutes.
My God.
It's some sort of giant metal face.
translation.it: È una specie di gigantesca faccia di metallo.

translation.en: Jesus.
Control, we are inside the ship.
Extensive damage.
Way too big to check the entire ship.
Everything is dead in here, Houston.
translation.it: Qui dentro è tutto morto, Houston.

translation.en: No signs of life anywhere.
translation.it: Non ci sono segni di vita.

translation.en: These things are massive.
We copy. You've got seven minutes on your oxygen.
translation.it: Ricevuto. Avete sette minuti di ossigeno.

translation.en: We are not alone after all, are we?
translation.it: Non siamo soli, dopo tutto, vero?

translation.en: No, sir. We're not alone.
[man] Go ahead, Mr. President.
[Nixon] Hello, Neil and Buzz. I'm talking to you by telephone
translation.it: Salve, Neil e Buzz. Vi sto parlando per telefono

translation.en: from the Oval Room at the White House.
translation.it: dallo studio ovale della Casa Bianca.

translation.en: And this certainly has to be the most historic telephone call ever made.
translation.it: E di certo questa è la più storica telefonata che sia mai stata fatta.

translation.en: I just can't tell you how proud we all are of what you've done.
translation.it: Non so dirvi quanto noi tutti siamo orgogliosi di voi.

translation.en: For every American, this has to be the proudest day of our lives.
translation.it: Per ogni americano dev'essere il giorno più glorioso della sua vita.

translation.en: Because of what you have done...
translation.it: Grazie a quello che voi avete fatto…

translation.en: [technician] We have splashdown.
[Nixon] ...the heavens have become a part of man's world.
translation.it: …i cieli sono diventati una parte del mondo dell'uomo.

translation.en: For one priceless moment...
in the whole history of man...
all the people on this earth are truly one.
translation.it: tutti i popoli della Terra sono davvero uniti.

translation.en: One in their pride in what you have done.
translation.it: Uniti nell'orgoglio per la vostra impresa.

translation.en: It inspires us to redouble our efforts
translation.it: Ciò ci ispira nel raddoppiare gli sforzi

translation.en: to bring peace and tranquility to earth.
translation.it: per portare pace e tranquillità sulla Terra.

translation.en: [Carly] My hero needs to wake up.
translation.it: Il mio eroe si deve svegliare.

translation.en: What is that?
This is your new lucky bunny.
Well, it's a beautiful thought, Carly, but I don't think it's the whole bunny that's lucky.
translation.it: Grazie del pensiero, Carly, ma non tutto il coniglio porta fortuna.

translation.en: You see, it's just this section here.
You see, it's just the rabbit foot that's lucky.
translation.it: È solo la zampa che porta fortuna.

translation.en: Well, it's just a good luck charm. To help you think positive?
translation.it: È solo per scaramanzia. Per pensare positivo.

translation.en: Today's important.
Come on, get up.
Hey, wear that nice tie. Yeah.
You need any money for lunch?
No, I don't need any money for lunch. I have money from yesterday's lunch.
translation.it: No, non mi servono. Ho ancora i soldi del pranzo di ieri.

translation.en: [Sam] You love it, don't you? I'm just your American boy toy.
translation.it: Ti piace, vero? Sono il tuo boy-toy americano.

translation.en: [chuckles] A lover boy toy.
You know how demoralizing it is to have saved the world twice and still be groveling for a job?
translation.it: È demoralizzante salvare il mondo due volte e dover mendicare un lavoro.

translation.en: People don't know you saved the world, Sam. I mean, I do. I believe you.
translation.it: Nessuno sa che hai salvato il mondo. Cioè, io sì. Guarda che ti credo.

translation.en: The government knows. I mean, they could have hooked me up with a job right here in D.C.
translation.it: Lo sa il governo. Un lavoro me lo potevano trovare qui a Washington.

translation.en: I mean, I should be working with the Autobots, otherwise, it's not fair.
translation.it: Anzi, dovrei lavorare con gli Autobot. Altrimenti non vale.

translation.en: Come on, they paid for your college. The President gave you a hero medal.
translation.it: Ti hanno pagato il college. Il Presidente ti ha dato una medaglia.

translation.en: [Obama] Thank you, man. Great job.
[whispering] That's the coolest thing that ever happened to me.
[Obama] All right, guys... [whispering] What the fuck!
And, as I recall, that wasn't even the highlight of your day.
translation.it: E se ben ricordo, non fu quello a illuminarti la giornata.

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, here.
[woman] British Embassy, you're up next.
translation.it: Ora la delegazione dell'UK. PRESIDENTE DEGLI STATI UNITI D'AMERICA

translation.en: [Judy] No, you don't wear it. See, you've gotta... The box.
[Sam] I couldn't, even if I wanted to.
You keep it in this. What a gorgeous box.
translation.it: Tienila qui dentro. Ma che bella scatola!

translation.en: Oh, yeah. My medal. You know who gave that to me?
translation.it: Sì, la mia medaglia. E chi me l'ha data?

translation.en: -Who? -POTUS.
President of the United States.
Babe, it's hard for everybody to get a job.
translation.it: È dura per tutti trovare un lavoro.

translation.en: I don't have time. You see, my parents are gonna be here in a week
translation.it: Non ho tempo. Tra una settimana saranno qui

translation.en: on their road trip Partybus World Tour.
translation.it: i miei per il loro Partybus World Tour.

translation.en: If my dad gets here and I don't have a job,
translation.it: Se mio padre arriva e non ho un lavoro,

translation.en: he's gonna spank me. You know, it's go time for me.
translation.it: sono sculacciate. È l'ora della verità per me.

translation.en: All right, tonight, I'll give you a job.
translation.it: Va bene, stasera ti darò un lavoro.

translation.en: Romance me with a nice dinner, and maybe you can get that bonus.
translation.it: Coccolami con una bella cena e ti meriterai anche un bonus.

translation.en: -Get lucky. -[Carly] Get him out of here!
[Brains] Wait. No, no, no, no.
[Carly] Oh, he's gross!
-She's good. -I'm sorry, but they're stranded here.
translation.it: - Volgare! - Che bella! Sono bloccati qui.

translation.en: Somebody's got to watch out for them.
Yesterday, that one was in my underwear drawer.
translation.it: Ieri me lo sono trovato nel cassetto dell'intimo.

translation.en: Did research. Looking real good, too. [chuckles]
translation.it: Facevo ricerche. Sapessi che c'era dentro!

translation.en: Oh! No need to hit me, man.
You are not a normal boyfriend. That's what you love about me.
translation.it: - Non sei un fidanzato normale. - È per questo che mi ami, no?

translation.en: -[Brains] Crybaby. -We're not at the love word yet.
Maybe a little bit closer when you're covering your half of the rent.
translation.it: Cominceremo a pensarci quando coprirai la tua parte d'affitto.

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Goodbye.
[Wheelie] Frickin' shorting my circuits out here!
translation.it: Mi prendo un corto circuito qui!

translation.en: It's inhumane, what it is! Make us live in a box
translation.it: È inumano! Farci vivere in una scatola,

translation.en: on a balcony, right next to a beast! Like a common animal!
translation.it: sul balcone, vicino a una bestia come fossimo animali.

translation.en: Stop, okay? You and your creepy sidekick, you can't be in here without permission.
translation.it: Tu e il tuo degno compare non entrate senza permesso.

translation.en: According to who? Miss Blondie Blonde?
translation.it: E chi l'ha detto? Miss Bionda Naturale?

translation.en: Giddyup, little doggie! Hyah!
Yo, Brains, wassup? Doing good.
translation.it: - Yo, Brains, come butta? - Alla grande.

translation.en: Shit, I seen this one. It's the one where Spock goes nuts.
translation.it: Cazzo, l'ho già visto. È quello dove Spock impazzisce.

translation.en: You know, Sam, I don't know about moving in with this chick. What if she dumps us like the last girl?
translation.it: Questa storia di venire qui con la tipa… Se poi ci molla come l'altra?

translation.en: She was mean. Didn't like her.
Us guys got to stick together.
♪ We are family ♪
No, we're not family. You're a political refugee,
translation.it: Non siamo una famiglia, voi siete rifugiati politici

translation.en: and I have finally found someone who appreciates me for me.
translation.it: e io finalmente ho trovato chi sa apprezzarmi veramente.

translation.en: Well, you tell her that we're not your pets, and we're not your toys!
translation.it: Spiegale che non siamo gatti e neanche giocattoli!

translation.en: All right? We're an advanced, genius alien race just looking for a home.
translation.it: Siamo una razza aliena, super avanzata, in cerca di una casa.

translation.en: -[Judy] Maybe it wasn't such a good idea. -[Ron] Didn't have to stop.
translation.it: Forse non è stata una buona idea.

translation.en: Come on. What're they going to do, tow it?
Where is he?
[gasps] Sammy!
-Oh, come on, that's funny! Ha-ha. -Sam.
I missed you guys so much.
Sure, you did. What do you think?
translation.it: Lo credo bene. Che ne dici?

translation.en: -[Sam] Look at that. -[Judy] Cute.
-[Sam] You look old. -[Judy] Stop it.
[Sam] Feel like I can see the end.
[Judy] I love your little tie. Hey, where's my girl?
translation.it: Mi piace questa cravatta. Dov'è la mia ragazza?

translation.en: -Where's my beautiful Carly? -She's at work, Ma. She's got a new job. You guys said you were gonna be here in a week.
translation.it: Al lavoro. Vi aspettavo tra una settimana.

translation.en: The 21st, not the 11th, Dad, remember?
We just hauled ass in this thing.
-We stopped for gas. -This thing. The love tub, it flies.
Oh, are we keeping you from something? Like, say, your job?
translation.it: Ma ti stiamo trattenendo? Vai al lavoro, ad esempio?

translation.en: Well, it's about time. You had us worried.
I have job interviews.
Oh. That's good.
-That sucks. -Stop it.
You don't have to be so negative, Dad. You know, you're in D.C. You're here with your son and your family.
translation.it: Sei troppo negativo. Sei a Washington con la tua famiglia.

translation.en: -I mean, it's a good time. -It sucks that you don't have a job.
translation.it: Fa schifo che non hai un lavoro.

translation.en: Yeah, but there's good things to do here, too, right? -Yeah. -Right? Museums and monuments, okay?
translation.it: Ma non c'è solo il lavoro qui, no? Musei, monumenti. A stasera.

translation.en: -I'll see you tonight. -[Ron] I'm bagging the gift.
[Judy] Sam, I think for an interview you should wear real pants.
translation.it: Al colloquio dovresti mettere dei pantaloni veri.

translation.en: [Sam] I think for life, you should wear real pants.
translation.it: Nella vita te li dovresti mettere.

translation.en: -[Judy] Oh, what happened to Bumblebee? -[Ron] Jesus.
He's off on his missions. I had to get this for backup.
translation.it: È andato in missione, ho preso questa d'emergenza.

translation.en: -[Ron] Your car has a job, huh? -[Judy] Stop.
translation.it: - La tua auto ce l'ha un lavoro. - Smettila.

translation.en: What does it change into?
It doesn't change into anything. It's a collector's item, Ma.
translation.it: Non si trasforma in niente, è da collezionisti.

translation.en: I got it for a steal. It just needs some work. Trust me.
[Judy] No, I think it's darling. It reminds me a lot of Bumblebee,
translation.it: È carinissima, mi ricorda tanto Bumblebee,

translation.en: if Bumblebee were a sad piece of shit.
translation.it: se Bumblebee fosse uno squallido pezzo di ferro.

translation.en: [Judy] Come on, we'll give you a ride!
[Optimus] In the years since our arrival, our new home, Earth,
translation.it: In questi anni, dal nostro arrivo, la nostra nuova casa, la Terra,

translation.en: has seen much change.
Energon detectors guard its cities now.
translation.it: Rilevatori di Energon ora proteggono le sue città.

translation.en: Long-range defense systems watch the skies.
translation.it: Sistemi di difesa a lungo raggio controllano i cieli.

translation.en: So now we assist our allies in solving human conflicts,
translation.it: MEDIO ORIENTE SITO NUCLEARE ABUSIVO Quindi ora assistiamo i nostri alleati nel risolvere i conflitti umani.

translation.en: to prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
translation.it: Per impedire agli esseri umani di farsi del male tra loro.

translation.en: [in Arabic] The Defense Minister's car.
[laughs] On the ground, per favore! And stay there!
translation.it: Tutti a terra, per favore! E restateci.

translation.en: [Optimus] We work in secret teams on various missions around the globe.
translation.it: Lavoriamo in squadre segrete a varie missioni intorno al globo.

translation.en: And all the while,
we search for signs of our true enemies' return.
translation.it: cerchiamo tracce del ritorno del nostro nemico.

translation.en: [Voshkod] I am Voshkod, General Counsel with Ukrainian Department of Energy.
translation.it: Sono Voshkod. Affari legali del Dipartimento dell'Energia Ucraino.

translation.en: My government will officially deny
that we're having this conversation.
At one of our decommissioned facilities, a discovery was made,
translation.it: In uno dei nostri impianti smantellati hanno fatto una scoperta,

translation.en: which I fear may be alien in nature.
translation.it: che temo sia di natura aliena.

translation.en: The facility's name is Chernobyl.
[Lennox] Mr. Voshkod.
So, uninhabited since '86.
I hear it won't be livable again for another 20,000 years?
translation.it: E non ci si potrà vivere per altri ventimila anni?

translation.en: At least. Ukraine was the most fertile land. It's a tragedy.
translation.it: Almeno. L'Ucraina era la più fertile delle terre. È una tragedia.

translation.en: This way.
[Lennox] Gear up! We have 60 minutes on the ground. Watch your radiation levels.
translation.it: Protezioni! 60 minuti di tolleranza. Occhio al livello delle radiazioni.

translation.en: Mr. Voshkod, where's your protective gear?
Where's your protective gear?
It would not matter. For me, it's only a matter of time.
translation.it: Non ha importanza. Per me è solo questione di tempo.

translation.en: Through the school.
Yuri will take you below. And one other thing, Colonel.
translation.it: Yuri vi accompagnerà giù. Un'altra cosa, colonnello.

translation.en: In private, there were some energy experiments--
[gasps] It can wait.
[Lennox] Keep moving. Stay tight.
[soldier] Okay, right here. I think I found it.
[Lennox] Optimus, we got a visual.
Looks like the object's clamped in some kind of a metal harness.
translation.it: L'oggetto sembra bloccato con una imbracatura metallica.

translation.en: What's this? Guys!
Why does this thing have Soviet space program markings on it?
translation.it: Perché ha i contrassegni del programma spaziale sovietico?

translation.en: [Lennox] Sputnik?
[soldier] Energon readings, sir. It's strong.
translation.it: Presenza di Energon, signore. È forte.

translation.en: Below us. It's coming fast.
Contact, contact!
[Lennox] Get topside now! Move, move, move!
-Let's go! -Weapons up!
Stay behind me!
soldier: Go! Go!
[Lennox] Fall back!
It's circling around us!
-It's taking our flank! -Come on!
[soldier] Get the heavy weapon!
What the hell was that thing?
[Optimus] That... is Shockwave.
Why was he after this?
It's impossible.
This is an engine part from a long lost Autobot ship.
translation.it: Questo è un pezzo del motore di una nave Autobot persa nel tempo.

translation.en: Pleasure working with you.
translation.it: È stato un piacere lavorare con te.

translation.en: [Judy] Interviews. This is so exciting.
Honey, do you want some gum? Your breath gets really gnarly when you're nervous.
translation.it: Vuoi una gomma? Ti viene un alito da topo morto quando sei teso.

translation.en: Mr. Witwicky?
Yeah. Search is over.
I'm Mr. Whitley.
Mr...
Is anybody else joining? No.
No? You want me to move right there? -I'll move right there. -I'd prefer not.
translation.it: - Vuole che venga lì? - Meglio di no.

translation.en: [Matsumoto] Ready? Begin.
Graduated this year. Majored in geopolitics, minor in tech studies.
Very interested in government and technology,
how that's gonna intersect and co-exist.
Shape the future.
[Ron] Why did we bother sending him to an Ivy college for?
translation.it: Tanta fatica per mandarlo in un Ivy College, e poi?

translation.en: Three months out of school and he can't find a job?
translation.it: In tre mesi che è fuori è ancora disoccupato?

translation.en: Mr. Masuhisu...
-Matsumoto. -Hasi...
-Matsumoto. -Moto.
-Martha, can I call you Martha? -No, you may not.
translation.it: - Posso chiamarla Martha? - Neanche per sogno.

translation.en: Okay, Jack, there's two types of people in this world.
translation.it: Ci sono due tipi di persone al mondo: quelli che pensano

translation.en: There's thinkers, there's doers.
translation.it: Ci sono due tipi di persone al mondo: quelli che pensano e quelli che agiscono.

translation.en: There's winners, there's dreamers, and there's buddies.
translation.it: Ci sono i vincenti, i sognatori, e gli amici.

translation.en: What about some weaknesses?
[scoffs] I don't...
You have a very trustworthy face. You remind me of, like, an Asian Colonel Sanders.

translation.en: A man I can trust.
[Judy] He's a millennial. That means they're the, you know, like lost generation.

The what?
Yeah, FBI. Good of you to flag that.
It was during all that alien craziness when you were 14.
translation.it: Fu durante la crisi aliena, quando lei era bambino.

translation.en: I mean, they were very kind to me, found me in a jiffy.
And that's all been expunged. Obama gave me a medal, actually.

translation.en: I'm just saying. It's always good to have a medal guy in the office, with a medal.
translation.it: Fa sempre comodo qualcuno in ufficio che ha avuto una medaglia.

translation.en: -From Obama? -Yeah.
In this office, we're mostly Republicans, so...
translation.it: In quest'ufficio siamo tutti repubblicani, quindi…

translation.en: I'm not feeling too good. -No? -No.
Why don't you get a little dipping tray and dip the dog in Pepto? That's a solution.

translation.en: Pow. I got another one. We got to go.
-Come on. -Really?
Sit.
Got myself a Mr. Sam Witwicky, recent college graduate.
translation.it: Davanti a me ho il signor Sam Witwicky, appena laureato.

translation.en: Previous experience, next to zero,
yet he has a recommend letter from our board?
translation.it: ma ha una lettera di raccomandazione del consiglio?

translation.en: WTF to that.
Do I know somebody on your board?
Here's the deal. You know who we are.
translation.it: sai chi siamo. Accuretta Systems, global leader

translation.en: Accuretta Systems, global leader in telecom,
translation.it: sai chi siamo. Accuretta Systems, global leader in telecom, aerospazio, 17 miliardi di profitto l'anno scorso.

translation.en: aerospace, 17 billion in profit last year.
translation.it: in telecom, aerospazio, 17 miliardi di profitto l'anno scorso.

translation.en: We contract for DARPA, NASA, JPL, you name it.
translation.it: Lavoriamo per DARPA, NASA, JPL, e via dicendo.

translation.en: You perform here, doors open for you anywhere.
translation.it: Se fai bene qui, ti si aprono portoni ovunque.

translation.en: First job out of college is critical, kid.
translation.it: Il primo impiego dopo il college è decisivo.

translation.en: You either take a step down the correct career path,
translation.it: Servono i giusti step verso un corretto indirizzamento,

translation.en: -or you fall into a life-sucking abyss. -Hmm.
translation.it: o ti ritrovi solo e sei risucchiato nell'abisso.

translation.en: So, it all depends on how you respond to my next two words:
translation.it: Quindi dipende tutto da come reagisci alla mia prossima parola:

translation.en: Impress me.
-Now? -Impress me.
You catch me off guard. -I don't know where to begin. -Impress me.
I'm an open book. Ask me any question you like.
-So you're a go-getter, ramrod... -Yes, sir. ...take-charge kind of guy?
translation.it: Quindi tu sei intraprendente, carismatico e autoritario?

translation.en: I'm a killer. A stone-cold killer.
translation.it: Sono un killer, un senza cuore.

translation.en: So, take-charge guy?
Take-charge, Viking, barbarian, of course, that's me.
translation.it: Autoritario, vichingo, barbaro. Certo, sono io.

translation.en: Pow! I'm here.
We are not looking for that here.
No brown-nosing. No suck up. No toolery. I--
translation.it: No ruffiani, no leccapiedi. No adulatori, io…

translation.en: [secretary] Yes, Mr. Brazos.
Why is Shontel using what appears to be a red cup
translation.it: Perché Shontel sta usando quella che a me sembra una tazza rossa

translation.en: from the red floor
translation.it: per il piano rosso, mentre siamo al piano giallo?

translation.en: -when we are on the yellow floor? -I'm on it.
translation.it: per il piano rosso, mentre siamo al piano giallo? Provvedo.

translation.en: It is a visual, and, therefore, a visceral betrayal.
translation.it: Questo è un tradimento di tipo visivo viscerale!

translation.en: Stop it!
Such a dumbass.
-[Brazos] Disgusting! -[whimpers]
Thank you!
It's total anarchy around here.
The e-mail I read said administrative aide?
Nope. Mailroom.
I'm gonna go.
Do you have any idea how many Ivy League Phi Beta Kappas would kill to--
translation.it: Hai un'idea di quanti Ivy League Phi Beta Kappa, ucciderebbero per…

translation.en: Mister, I saved your life twice. Okay?
translation.it: Mister, le ho salvato la vita due volte, ok?

translation.en: I can't tell you how, or when, or why,
translation.it: Lasci stare quando, come o perché,

translation.en: but I have done shit that matters, and I'd just kind of like a job where I matter again.
translation.it: ma ho fatto cose di un certo livello e mi piacerebbe un lavoro di un certo livello.

translation.en: So thank you, but, no, thank you, okay?
You know what I think? You want the job after this job.
translation.it: Sai cosa penso? Tu vuoi il posto dopo questo posto.

translation.en: But, son, this is the job that's standing in your way.
translation.it: Ma è questo il lavoro che ti si presenta adesso.

translation.en: And that's why you're gonna be so very, very good at it.
translation.it: Per questo sarai molto bravo a farlo.

translation.en: 'Cause when I look at you, I see a younger me.
translation.it: Quando guardo te, vedo un giovane me.

translation.en: [man, over PA] All arriving Autobots, in par,
translation.it: A tutti gli Autobot: previsto addestramento e rapporto tra 15 minuti.

translation.en: training and debriefing in 15 minutes.
translation.it: previsto addestramento e rapporto tra 15 minuti.

translation.en: Dino, report to Bay 23.
Sideswipe, Bay 37 for weapons assessment.
[Mearing] Senator, I suggest you remember that when the NSA wants funding, they call me.
translation.it: Senatore, ricordi che quando l'NSA vuole fondi, chiama me.

translation.en: When the CIA is gonna take out a target, they ask first for my permission.
translation.it: Quando la CIA deve eliminare un bersaglio, chiede il mio permesso.

translation.en: And when the President wants to know
translation.it: E quando il Presidente si chiede quale membro del Congresso

translation.en: which members of Congress are politically vulnerable
translation.it: E quando il Presidente si chiede quale membro del Congresso sia politicamente vulnerabile, in termini di condotta morale non impeccabile,

translation.en: in terms of, let's say, undiscovered criminal conduct,
translation.it: sia politicamente vulnerabile, in termini di condotta morale non impeccabile,

translation.en: I'm the number he dials.
[newscaster, on TV] U.S. agencies say they have been monitoring the blast.
translation.it: Le agenzie americane stanno monitorando l'esplosione.

translation.en: But if, in fact, this was a covert military strike,
translation.it: Se questo fosse un attacco militare segreto,

translation.en: no nation has claimed responsibility.
CIA is up my ass about this mystery raid in the Middle East.
translation.it: La CIA mi tormenta per questo misterioso raid in Medio Oriente.

translation.en: So, it's time to come clean. Was your unit involved?
Uh, I'm not sure, ma'am.
All right, guys. This is how you do a Decepticon head kill shot.
translation.it: Guardate come si uccide un Decepticon con un colpo alla testa.

translation.en: As Director of National Intelligence,
I'm a really big fan of intelligent answers.
I can't really tell you definitively. These Autobots are like teenage kids.
translation.it: Non so dirglielo con sicurezza, questi Autobot sono come dei ragazzini.

translation.en: They like to sneak out of the house every once in a while.
Colonel Lennox, are you in command or are you not?
Yes, ma'am, I am.
Stop with the "ma'am." Enough with the "ma'am." Do I look like a "ma'am"?
No, ma'am. Yes, ma'am. Yes.
This gun is my perfect invention, Ironhide.
translation.it: Quest'arma è la mia invenzione perfetta.

translation.en: Right.
Oh, good, you're here!
Me name's Que. I do hope you have answers for him. I've never seen him so upset.
translation.it: Sono Que, spero abbiate delle risposte. Non l'ho mai visto così sconvolto.

translation.en: Optimus, you remember Charlotte Mearing?
Our Director of National Intelligence?
He's in a bad mood. He's not talking to anybody today.
translation.it: È di cattivo umore. Oggi non parla con nessuno.

translation.en: What is this, the silent treatment?
translation.it: Che succede? Ci sta tenendo il muso?

translation.en: -We've seen that and this is not that. -Definitely not. This is worse.
translation.it: Lo conosciamo quando tiene il muso. Stavolta è peggio.

translation.en: Prime! Make something of yourself!
He's pissed.
You lied to us.
Everything humans know of our planet we were told had all been shared.
translation.it: Pensavamo che aveste condiviso ciò che gli umani sanno del nostro pianeta.

translation.en: So why was this found in human possession?
translation.it: Quindi perché questo è stato trovato in vostro possesso?

translation.en: We were in the dark on this, also. It was Director Only clearance at Sector 7 until now.
translation.it: Hanno lasciato anche noi all'oscuro. Solo il Direttore del Settore 7 sapeva.

translation.en: The bag.
-[whispers] Which bag? -Hermes. Birkin. Green ostrich!
translation.it: - Quale borsa? - Hermès, Birkin, struzzo verde!

translation.en: Oh, my God.
This is a secret few men knew, and fewer still remain alive.
translation.it: È un segreto che sapevano in pochi. E pochi sono quelli rimasti in vita.

translation.en: Allow me to please introduce to you
two of NASA's founding mission directors,
translation.it: due direttori di missione veterani della NASA,

translation.en: and astronaut, Dr. Buzz Aldrin, one of the first two men to step foot on the moon.
translation.it: e l'astronauta Buzz Aldrin, uno dei primi due uomini ad andare sulla Luna.

translation.en: Sir? Optimus Prime.
From a fellow space traveler, it's a true honor.
translation.it: Come collega di viaggio nello spazio, è un vero onore.

translation.en: The honor is mine.
Our entire space race of the 1960s,
translation.it: La nostra corsa allo spazio degli anni '60,

translation.en: it appears, was in response to an event.
translation.it: a quanto pare, fu in risposta a un evento.

translation.en: Our astronauts investigated a crashed alien ship.
translation.it: I nostri astronauti indagavano su una nave aliena caduta.

translation.en: No survivors onboard.
We were sworn to secrecy by our commander-in-chief.
translation.it: Avevamo giurato segretezza al nostro Comandante in Capo.

translation.en: This was a mission you will never speak of.
translation.it: Questa è una missione di cui non dovrete parlare mai.

translation.en: I understand, sir.
A total of 35 people knew the real plan at NASA.
translation.it: Solo in 35 sapevano del vero piano alla NASA.

translation.en: Soviets managed to land unmanned probes.
translation.it: I sovietici mandarono sonde senza equipaggio.

translation.en: Somehow they must have picked up that fuel rod.
translation.it: E riuscirono a raccogliere quella barra di combustibile.

translation.en: We believe the Russians deduced
translation.it: Pensiamo che i russi dedussero che la barra

translation.en: that the rod was a fissionable fuel assembly, believed they had it mastered, and tried to harness it at Chernobyl.
translation.it: fosse di combustibile nucleare e cercarono di imbrigliarla a Chernobyl.

translation.en: We landed six missions in all.
We took hundreds of photos and samples.
translation.it: Facemmo centinaia di foto e prendemmo dei campioni.

translation.en: We locked them away forever,
and the moon program was shut down.
translation.it: e il programma lunare fu chiuso.

translation.en: Well, did you search the crash vault?
The ship's name was the Ark.
translation.it: Il nome della nave era Arca.

translation.en: I watched it escape Cybertron myself.
translation.it: L'ho vista lasciare Cybertron con i miei occhi.

translation.en: It was carrying an Autobot technology which would have won us the war
translation.it: Trasportava una tecnologia Autobot che ci avrebbe fatto vincere la guerra,

translation.en: and its captain.
Who was its captain?
The great Sentinel Prime, the technology's inventor.
translation.it: Il grande Sentinel Prime, l'inventore della tecnologia.

translation.en: He was commander of the Autobots before me.
translation.it: Era il comandante degli Autobot, prima di me.

translation.en: It's imperative that I find it
translation.it: È indispensabile che io la trovi

translation.en: before the decepticons learn of its location.
translation.it: prima che i Decepticon scoprano la sua posizione.

translation.en: Our Autobot spacecraft has the ability to get there.
translation.it: La nostra astronave Autobot è in grado di raggiungerla.

translation.en: And you must pray it's in time.
translation.it: E dovete pregare che sia in tempo.

translation.en: Hi. I'm here to see Carly Spencer.
-You got the job? -This is crazy.
translation.it: - Hai avuto il lavoro? - Se sapessi!

translation.en: -You really got it? -Yes. See, what did I tell you? It's the bunny.
translation.it: Te l'hanno dato? È tutto merito del coniglio!

translation.en: You are so welcome.
Do you like me more? A little bit, yeah.
translation.it: - Ti piaccio di più? - Un po' di più.

translation.en: You said you were his assistant curator, you didn't say the guy owns Space Mountain.
translation.it: Sapevo che eri il suo assistente, non che possedeva Space Mountain.

translation.en: I know. Isn't it beautiful in here? And he's the coolest guy. Ever. -[Sam] Yeah? -[Carly] Yeah.
translation.it: Non è bellissimo qui? E lui è un figo da paura.

translation.en: Hey. A pleasure to meet you.
Pleasure meeting you. Carly's told me a lot about you.
translation.it: Piacere mio. Carly mi ha parlato molto di te.

translation.en: Well, vice versa. It's a beautiful building you got. It's like the Starship Enterprise in here.
translation.it: Altrettanto. È un bellissimo palazzo. Sembra l'Enterprise, qui.

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you very much. It leaks.
Before Carly came to help run the collection, it was just a complete mess.
translation.it: Prima che Carly pensasse alla collezione, eravamo nel casino totale.

translation.en: But now, the restorations are back on track.
translation.it: Ma ora i restauri hanno ripreso alla grande.

translation.en: We're going to Pebble Beach this year, and we're gonna get a trophy for that stand right there.
translation.it: Andiamo a Pebble Beach a ritirare un premio per quello stand.

translation.en: You know why? Because this woman right here
translation.it: Sai perché? Perché la donna qui presente

translation.en: -is my secret weapon. -[Sam] Okay.
Mr. Gould, please, you exaggerate. All I've done is get you organized.
translation.it: Signor Gould, lei esagera. Non ho fatto altro che organizzare.

translation.en: You've done much more than that, my Duchess.
translation.it: Hai fatto molto di più, mia duchessa.

translation.en: Nicknames, that's fun.
Yeah. The Duchess.
She's adorable.
You know, when I stole her away from the British Embassy,
I said, "It's easy to manage a country.
translation.it: ho detto: "È facile gestire un Paese,

translation.en: Try managing a priceless collection of art."
translation.it: prova a gestire un'inestimabile collezione d'arte."

translation.en: Take a look at this 1939 Delahaye 165 Cabriolet.
translation.it: Dai un'occhiata a questa Delahaye 165 cabriolet del '39, disegnata da un francese.

translation.en: Designed by a Frenchman.
translation.it: cabriolet del '39, disegnata da un francese.

translation.en: Look at the curves. Elegant, isn't it? Beautiful.
translation.it: Guarda che curve. Elegante, eh? Bellissima.

translation.en: Sensual.
Built to evoke the body of the ideal woman.
translation.it: Fatta per evocare il corpo della donna ideale.

translation.en: Come on.
My dad had a ten dollar desk and a dream,
translation.it: Mio padre aveva solo una scrivania e un sogno,

translation.en: and he built it into an empire.
translation.it: e ci ha costruito sopra un impero.

translation.en: [Dylan] We're the largest accounting firm in the U.S.
translation.it: Siamo la più grande società di revisione bilanci d'America.

translation.en: I started up the venture side after he passed. Invest in the future.
translation.it: Ho cominciato le speculazioni quando è mancato. Investo nel futuro.

translation.en: Try and bet on the winners.
See, collecting cars helps me keep my sanity.
translation.it: Collezionare auto mi fa restare sano di mente.

translation.en: You guys look great.
That was a great day, Mr. Gould.
-I haven't seen that one. -No. Me, neither.
-[Dylan] Jeans are tight. -[Sam exhales]
Here we go. Here we go. You see that?
Judgment. Judging a man by his car? And you're gonna wave at him while he's judging me?
translation.it: Giudica un uomo dall'auto? E tu gli fai ciao?

translation.en: [Carly] What's with you? He's my boss. This job pays for our food, our rent.
translation.it: Ma che vuoi? È il mio boss! Mangiamo grazie a lui!

translation.en: [Sam] No, I totally understand. I'm totally fine. I get it. I'm well fed.
translation.it: Capisco bene, è lampante. Non muoio di fame!

translation.en: And guess what? I'm not your boy toy anymore. I got my big boy pants on. You see them?
translation.it: Ma non sono più il tuo boy-toy. Porto i pantaloni lunghi, vedi?

translation.en: In the car. Thank you, Duchess.
Oh, my God. Are you threatened by him?
translation.it: Oh mio Dio! Ti senti minacciato da lui?

translation.en: Threatened? What am I threatened by? His money? His power? His good looks?
translation.it: Perché dovrei? Perché è abbiente? È potente? È avvenente?

translation.en: None of the above. Check!
God! Your temper tantrums are so sexy.
translation.it: Quando ti arrabbi diventi così sexy!

translation.en: Get in the car, please.
Sam, he's hardly the first man to ever smile at me. -I think I can handle it. -Hold on, hold on.
translation.it: Non è il primo uomo della Terra a sorridermi, posso resistergli.

translation.en: It's the smiling back part that gets me. Okay?
translation.it: È il sorriso ricambiato a irritarmi!

translation.en: No more smiles. Never again. I promise.
-That works for me. -Yeah?
Easy! Easy! You're not gonna get it started that way.
translation.it: Calma! Non si accende a calci.

translation.en: Well, I was just getting it ready. I'm about 32% done with my restoration.
translation.it: La preparo. Sono al 32% con il mio restauro.

translation.en: Some chrome work, put a spoiler on the back. Done deal.
You know, Carly's been telling me you've been struggling job-wise.
translation.it: Carly dice che non trovi lavoro.

translation.en: Just so you know,
translation.it: Combinazione, sono nel consiglio dell'Accuretta Systems,

translation.en: I'm on the board for Accuretta Systems, and I put in a call for you.
translation.it: Combinazione, sono nel consiglio dell'Accuretta Systems, ho fatto una telefonatina.

translation.en: Let's keep it between us, okay? She's so proud of you.
translation.it: Rimanga fra noi, ok? È così fiera di te.

translation.en: You're a lucky man.
[Optimus] Xanthium approaching Tranquility Base.
translation.it: Xanthium in avvicinamento a Base Tranquillità.

translation.en: [man 1] You're a go for landing.
Ratchet, let's roll.
[Optimus] We're entering the Ark.
His levels are faint.
He locked himself away to guard the pillars.
translation.it: Si è chiuso dall'interno per proteggere i pilastri.

translation.en: You're coming home, old friend.
translation.it: Si torna a casa, vecchio amico.

translation.en: [Megatron] All hail Megatron.
[giggling] My master! Yes, master!
Oh, don't be greedy, my fragile ones.
translation.it: Non siate ingorde, mie fragili creature.

translation.en: My poor master.
How it pains me to see you so wounded, so weak.
translation.it: Che dolore vederti così ferito, così debole.

translation.en: Spare me, you gaseous sycophant!
You know what you are told, which is nothing.
translation.it: Sai ciò che ti viene detto, cioè niente!

translation.en: Soundwave reporting, Lord Megatron.
And what news from your little assassin?
translation.it: Che notizie del nostro piccolo assassino?

translation.en: Autobots have taken the bait.
They've discovered the Ark and returned with its cargo.
translation.it: Hanno scoperto l'Arca e sono tornati col carico.

translation.en: You did me great honor tracking that ship to the moon.
translation.it: Mi hai fatto grande onore rintracciando quella nave sulla Luna.

translation.en: Your human collaborators have served their purpose, Soundwave.
translation.it: I tuoi collaboratori umani hanno fatto la loro parte, Soundwave.

translation.en: It's time to eliminate loose ends.
translation.it: È tempo di eliminare le appendici inutili.

translation.en: [Soundwave] Laserbeak, kill them all.
[Laserbeak] With pleasure.
Is your daddy home?
-[girl] "Then Madeline said..." -[woman] Madeline!
Hello, Mom.
[woman] Get out of the house!
What are you doing in my house? [Laserbeak] Just visiting.
translation.it: - Che ci fai in casa mia? - Sono in visita.

translation.en: What is this hoochie-mama outfit?
translation.it: Che fai con le tette di fuori?

translation.en: No, this is the aerospace division, okay? We do not allow that here!
translation.it: Questa è la divisione aerospazio! E non ti presenti qui così!

translation.en: New guy! You see that? That's a Latin meltdown, okay?
translation.it: Nuovo! La vedi? È una latina insubordinata.

translation.en: You ever show up in my office with a hoochie-mama outfit, you're fired.
translation.it: Presentati in ufficio conciato così e ti caccio.

translation.en: You got that? Okay, you're gonna be on this cart for two-and-a-half years, okay?
translation.it: Spingerai quel carrello per due anni e mezzo.

translation.en: I want you to live it, love it, and name it.
translation.it: Sarà la tua vita, il tuo mondo.

translation.en: There's no ladder-climbing in my office. I run a tight ship. Okay? -Yes, sir. -Move!
translation.it: Niente arrampicatori nel mio ufficio, con me righi dritto. Muoviti!

translation.en: I found that paper I was telling you about.
translation.it: Ho trovato il documento di cui ti parlavo.

translation.en: -What are we looking at? -Shut up!
You do that to me again, and I'll kick your ass!
translation.it: Rifallo e ti prendo a calci!

translation.en: -Hi. -[chuckles]
Hi, angel.
-How are you? -Good.
I had a meeting downtown. Was it okay for me to stop by?
translation.it: Ero da queste parti, ho fatto male a passare?

translation.en: I don't know. My 500-page employee conduct manual isn't exactly a page turner.
translation.it: Non so, le 500 pagine del manuale dell'impiegato non mi ispirano.

translation.en: This is great.
Yeah, Autobots are off saving the world, and I have organized four binders.
translation.it: Gli Autobot salvano il mondo e io organizzo raccoglitori.

translation.en: I'm living the dream. Come on.
Visitor violation.
You okay? Absolutely.
I'm next.
Listen. Saturday. Dylan's throwing a party at his house.
translation.it: Senti, sabato Dylan dà un party a casa sua.

translation.en: It's a work thing, but he's invited you, too.
translation.it: È lavoro, ma sei invitato anche tu.

translation.en: -Oh, did he? -I want you to come and laugh at my bad jokes.
translation.it: Oh, pensa! Voglio che vieni e ridi alle mie battute. È importante per me.

translation.en: It would really mean a lot to me, okay?
translation.it: Voglio che vieni e ridi alle mie battute. È importante per me.

translation.en: I'd love to go. How'd you get over here?
-Car. -You don't have a car.
Yes, I do. What, did you win it in a raffle?
translation.it: - Ora, sì. - L'hai vinta alla lotteria?

translation.en: Uh, he gave me one.
He gave you a car? Yeah, I think it was a work perk.
Huh. A work perk.
What kind of car did he give you? -A Mercedes SLS AMG. -Mm-hmm. [typing]
translation.it: - Che auto ti ha dato? - Una Mercedes SLS AMG.

translation.en: Really throaty engine.
[woman] Mercedes-Benz SLS
-combines breathtaking performance... -You drove this here? [sighs]
That's a $200,000 car.
[whispering] I know.
You know how long it would take me to afford a car like this?
translation.it: Sai quanto dovrei lavorare per comprarla?

translation.en: -A long time? -Yeah, like 53 years.
He said it was for both of us.
translation.it: Ha detto che è per entrambi.

translation.en: Then what we should do is, we should sell it and buy a house.
translation.it: Allora la vendi e ci compriamo casa.

translation.en: You're frustrated, I know. I've been there.
translation.it: Sei frustrato, lo so. Ci sono passata. Stai facendo la gavetta. Verranno tempi migliori.

translation.en: It's called paying your dues. Good things will happen.
translation.it: Ci sono passata. Stai facendo la gavetta. Verranno tempi migliori.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I need some lunch time filing done, stat.
translation.it: Signore e signori, mi serve un volontario in pausa pranzo.

translation.en: Who would like to score some Bruce Brazos points?
translation.it: Chi vuole accumulare punti Bruce Brazos?

translation.en: Bruce, you found your guy.
The man who makes this company run.
translation.it: Appena arrivato, è già il motore dell'azienda!

translation.en: Now, who have we here?
Is it a sister, Facebook friend, Twitter tweeter?
translation.it: È una sorella? Amica di Facebook? Tuittera di Twitter?

translation.en: -Carly, this is Bruce. Bruce. -Hi.
I'm his girlfriend. A pleasure to meet you.
translation.it: Piacere, sono la sua ragazza. Sam ha ragione,

translation.en: Sam was right. You really do have a smashing head of hair.
Well, thank you.
-Sam, I got to run. -Yeah.
Here, your present.
Your favorite color.
-Nice to meet you, Mr. Brazos. -And you.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere, signor Brazos. - Tutto mio.

translation.en: See you, boys.
I'm still stewing about that binder incident, Jerry.
translation.it: Ribollo ancora per quello che hai fatto prima, Jerry.

translation.en: May I finish my Shuhua milk, Donny?
translation.it: Posso finire il mio latte Shuhua, Donny?

translation.en: I don't care about your exotic milk. I care about respect!
translation.it: Non mi interessano le tue esotiche bevande. Pretendo rispetto!

translation.en: I know who you are!
-I'm talking to you! -Excuse me. Thank you.
translation.it: Sto parlando con te! Scusami. Grazie.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Slow down, tiger.
You showed up in the background of six different photos, two continents, with aliens.
translation.it: Ti si vede su sei diverse foto, due continenti, con gli alieni!

translation.en: That was you in Egypt, huh, right? Because you know the aliens.
translation.it: Non eri tu, in Egitto? Perché tu conosci gli alieni!

translation.en: See you!
Give me my jacket!
I'm Wang. Deep Wang. Deep Wang.
You're not getting it. Deep Throat.
Watergate? I'm talking code to you... Shh!
Damn it.
They watch and listen.
I can't go to the government, but you can.
translation.it: Non posso avvertire il governo, ma tu puoi!

translation.en: Because shit's going down, son! It is Code Pink, as in Floyd.
translation.it: Perché siamo nella merda! È codice Pink, come i Floyd!

translation.en: Dark Side. Why do you think no one's been up there since 1972?
translation.it: Dark Side! Perché nessuno è andato sulla Luna dal '72?

translation.en: I know you're speaking English, I just... It's a very strange English. That's why I'm not--
translation.it: Lo so che dovrei capire, in fondo parli la mia stessa lingua…

translation.en: Don't. I'm gonna hit you.
I'm gonna hit you right back, son.
translation.it: E io ti picchio più forte.

translation.en: It's my manifesto.
They're whacking us out, everyone who knows what's on the dark--
translation.it: Ci stanno eliminando, chiunque sappia che c'è sul lato…

translation.en: Your alien friends are in danger, you know, the good ones. It's up to you.
translation.it: I tuoi amici alieni rischiano, dipende da te.

translation.en: [Jerry] Calm down.
Easy, Sam!
What are you looking at?
Yo, dawg.
Are you up in my shit? Who are you working for?
translation.it: Ti fai i cazzi miei? Per chi lavori?

translation.en: Staredown, you and me.
Guess I won.
Moon satellites.
The Russian space program.
Experts dead.
Space program ends.
Dark side... Dark side of the moon.
Look what I found outside the bathroom. Is it yours?
translation.it: Ho trovato questi fuori dal bagno. Sono tuoi?

translation.en: Deal with this. Yes, sir.
I did everything you want!
translation.it: Ho fatto tutto quello che vuoi!

translation.en: I really think we should talk, 'cause some of the stuff--
Whoa! Knock first!
Can't you see I'm busy? Who are you? Who are you?
translation.it: Non vedi che ho da fare? Chi sei?

translation.en: You straddled me in the stall.
That's happened to me once in this life. I wouldn't forget it.
translation.it: È stata un'esperienza bruttissima e non la dimentico.

translation.en: -I don't know. -From the bathroom stall. You took your package out.
translation.it: Dentro il bagno, hai tirato fuori il pacco e…

translation.en: We are not boyfriends, okay?
One phone call from me and I'll have you fired. Oh, yes, I will, gaylord!
translation.it: Una telefonata e ti faccio cacciare, degayzzo l'ufficio!

translation.en: -[Jerry screaming] -Are you okay?
Hemorrhoids!
Should I come back? When should I come back?
Come back when you learn some manners!
I don't know him! I would never say anything!
translation.it: Non lo conosco! Non rivelerei mai niente!

translation.en: Okay, okay! I sabotaged the mapping satellite,
just like I promised, I can put a blind spot in the program as a bonus.
translation.it: e ho inserito un punto cieco nel programma per mappare.

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Jerry, you are my favorite.
translation.it: Jerry, tu sei il mio preferito. Farò tutto quello che vuoi.

translation.en: I'll do whatever you want me to do.
I know, but my superiors need me to...
translation.it: Lo so, ma i miei superiori mi chiedono…

translation.en: Please, you don't have to... ...suicide you.
What did you say to Witwicky?
Oh, shit!
Huh? Who wants some chicken dinner now, bitch?
translation.it: Chi vuole pollo per cena, stronzo?

translation.en: 'Cause somebody messed with the wrong Wang today!
translation.it: Hai sbagliato a metterti contro lo zio Jerry!

translation.en: Come on! You want some of me?
No, no, no!
I don't need any more didactic lectures from Chuck.
translation.it: E non voglio più lezioncine e predicozzi da Chuck.

translation.en: -[screaming] -Jesus!
[Brazos] Get legal.
That's Jerry!
Come on, people. Yes, a workmate died, but looking out the window is not going to bring him back.
translation.it: Sì, un collega è morto, ma guardar fuori dalla finestra non lo riporterà in vita!

translation.en: The man was depressed.
Don't take a picture!
You can keep watching him, but he's not getting up. You all read "Humpty Dumpty." Okay?
translation.it: Continuate pure a guardare, tanto non si rialza. È troppo spiaccicato ormai.

translation.en: I'm spearheading the press. You clean up.
translation.it: Io mi do in pasto alla stampa, tu pulisci.

translation.en: Wang is everywhere. He is in the bistro.
translation.it: Wang è dappertutto. È nel bistrot,

translation.en: He's in the bamboo. He's on the balustrade.
You see the sidewalk down there? [chuckles] Man!
Box up his personals. Get his name off his parking space.
translation.it: Raccogli i suoi oggetti, togli il nome dal suo posto auto.

translation.en: [man] Hey, when did we get a new copier?
Listen, I'm not gonna say anything about what I saw.
translation.it: Io non racconterò ciò che ho visto.

translation.en: Who you share a toilet stall with is totally your business.
translation.it: Chi frequenti nel chiuso della toilette sono affari tuoi.

translation.en: This is exceedingly Japanese.
They never make it easy, do they?
[Carly] What is with you?
[Sam] This is the real deal, Carly, okay?
translation.it: La cosa è seria. Tu rimani al tuo posto.

translation.en: I need you to stay composed. It's real life. I'll explain it to you later.
translation.it: La cosa è seria. Tu rimani al tuo posto. È vita reale, ti spiego dopo.

translation.en: We've got an emergency. You gotta get Colonel Lennox out here.
I'm reporting a Decepticon. The Decepticons are back. You gotta open that gate right now.
translation.it: I Decepticon sono tornati, aprite il cancello.

translation.en: Easy, sir. This is Health and Human Services.
translation.it: Qui è il Dipartimento della Salute e dei Servizi Umani.

translation.en: Right. Packing M4s?
What are you protecting, colostomy bags? -Bedpans? Throat lozenges? -[Carly] Babe...
Where'd you get that hat from, nursing school? So, you're nurses and foot-powder protectors? -Babe. -Fantastic. Yes.
translation.it: Cos'è, un cappello da infermiere? Siete infermieri e protettori di flebo?

translation.en: -I don't think we're in the right place. -We are in the right place.
translation.it: - E se non è questo il posto? - Invece, sì!

translation.en: We're in the right place, and I'm gonna talk to Optimus right now. -You're gonna get Optimus out here. -Sir.
You got the wrong building. I don't know what you're talking about.
What part of "Decepticons are back" do you not understand?
[bangs car] Yo! You being a smartass?
Do not hit my car! It's a collector's item!
translation.it: Giù le mani dalla mia auto! È da collezionista!

translation.en: I wouldn't do that.
-[alarm blaring] -[Carly] You're crazy!
-[device beeping] -We got an Energon reading!
We've got aliens in the vehicle!
-[screaming] -You move, you're dead! Out! Out!
translation.it: Una mossa e siete morti! Fuori!

translation.en: -Got aliens in the vehicle! -[screaming]
-Freeze! Get out! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Are you kidding me?
[Carly] Sam, they've got guns!
[guard] I got him. Go! Bee! Is Bee in there?
translation.it: - Lo tengo! - C'è Bee lì dentro?

translation.en: [groans] Okay, all right!
This how you treat Autobots? We're on the same team.
translation.it: Così trattate gli Autobot? Siamo nella stessa squadra!

translation.en: Yeah, enjoy your next job at 7-Eleven, dickhead.
translation.it: Preparati ad andare a girare gli hamburger, stronzo!

translation.en: -That's right. -A-hole.
How's your car now?
That's my car.
Come here.
Come here!
Come on. Sam.
What is your deal, huh?
I know your black ops stuff is important to you.
I'm not trying to diminish it or guilt-trip you or anything, I just never see you anymore.
translation.it: e non voglio sminuirle o farti sentire in colpa,

translation.en: You can't come to the garage and just hang out one night?
translation.it: ma non puoi passare al garage a trovarmi, una sera?

translation.en: Sam. That makes me feel bad.
translation.it: Sam, così mi fai star male.

translation.en: I hope you feel bad. You should feel bad. Look at the jalopy I'm driving now. I feel bad every single day.
translation.it: Devi star male! Guarda che cesso guido ora! Io sto male più di te.

translation.en: [guard] Yo, let's go, both of you. Lennox wants to see you.
What, we not good enough for you anymore?
I'm sorry, babe. They were very rude, all right?
And you're fixing my car. You don't think so?
[Sam] Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho-ninja copier
translation.it: Alzi la mano chi stava per esser ucciso da una fotocopiatrice volante!

translation.en: Those are my brass knuckles.
That's my anklet. Do I have to take that off, too? And my toe rings?
translation.it: Devo levarmi anche la cavigliera? E gli anelli da piede?

translation.en: [man, on PA] All NEST officials clear the floor. We have ten minutes until attempted contact.
translation.it: Gli ufficiali NEST liberino l'area. 10 minuti al tentativo di contatto.

translation.en: [Mearing] We've taken possession of the five devices that were hidden in the ship with Sentinel Prime.
translation.it: Siamo entrati in possesso dei cinque dispositivi nascosti con Sentinel Prime.

translation.en: They're some kind of prototype Autobot technology.
translation.it: Sono un qualche prototipo di tecnologia Autobot.

translation.en: They say Sentinel was the Einstein of his civilization,
translation.it: Dicono che Sentinel fosse l'Einstein della sua civiltà,

translation.en: so we're gonna keep these locked up
until we know what we're dealing with.
translation.it: finché non sapremo di che si tratta.

translation.en: Right now, no one gets access. No one.
translation.it: A nessuno è consentito l'accesso. A nessuno.

translation.en: This Wang guy recognized me. He told me to warn you.
translation.it: Quel Wang mi ha riconosciuto. Parlava di avvertirvi

translation.en: He was talking about the dark side of the moon,
translation.it: del lato nascosto della Luna, e l'ha ucciso.

translation.en: -then they killed him. -Wait a minute. He mentioned the moon?
translation.it: del lato nascosto della Luna, e l'ha ucciso. - Ha parlato della Luna? - Del lato oscuro.

translation.en: Yeah, dark side of the moon.
translation.it: - Ha parlato della Luna? - Del lato oscuro.

translation.en: But why would Decepticons want to kill humans?
translation.it: Perché i Decepticon ucciderebbero gli umani?

translation.en: I thought their war was with the Autobots.
translation.it: Sono in guerra con gli Autobot.

translation.en: And that is when he made his first quick-look science report. That's what we want--
translation.it: E questo fu il suo primo sopralluogo scientifico.

translation.en: Who's the chick? Okay. Excuse me. Colonel Lennox?
translation.it: Quella chi è? Mi scusi! Colonnello Lennox?

translation.en: Director Mearing, this is Sam Witwicky...
translation.it: Direttore Mearing, lui è Sam Witwicky.

translation.en: I know his name, Colonel. I wanna know who gave him clearance?
translation.it: Conosco il nome. Chi gli ha dato il permesso?

translation.en: Who gave me clearance? How about Optimus Prime, when he touched down in suburbia looking for my house?
translation.it: Le basta Optimus Prime? Mi ha trovato nel giardino di casa mia.

translation.en: This is the National Intelligence Director. In case you...
translation.it: Lei è il direttore dell'Intelligence Nazionale, nel caso…

translation.en: -Hi. -Disrespecting a federal officer? Huh.
translation.it: Salve. Prendi in giro un funzionario federale? Farai strada. Lei chi è?

translation.en: Maybe that'll get you somewhere. Who's she?
translation.it: Prendi in giro un funzionario federale? Farai strada. Lei chi è?

translation.en: -She's my girlfriend. -What is this, like, a date?
translation.it: La mia ragazza. L'hai portata qui a cena?

translation.en: She knows all about the Autobots, okay? She knows Bumblebee.
translation.it: Sa tutto degli Autobot, conosce Bumblebee.

translation.en: And she comes from a military family. I can vouch for her.
translation.it: Viene da una famiglia di militari. Garantisco io.

translation.en: Hey, I have an idea. How about we get back to the important topics,
like the fact that I almost had my face cut off by a Decepticon?
translation.it: Sono stato quasi affettato da un Decepticon!

translation.en: As a taxpayer, I'd like to lodge a complaint, as a matter of fact.
translation.it: Pago le tasse, ho diritto a fare reclamo.

translation.en: Okay, listen, all right? One of the software engineers at Sam's office was murdered today.
translation.it: Uno sviluppatore dell'ufficio di Sam è stato ucciso oggi.

translation.en: He was involved in NASA's lunar mapping probe.
Here's the thing, Colonel Lennox.
We cannot entrust national security to teenagers
translation.it: non possiamo affidare la sicurezza nazionale a dei teenager.

translation.en: unless I missed a policy paper. Are we doing that now? No. Good.
translation.it: Almeno era la nostra politica. Mi sono persa la circolare? No? Bene.

translation.en: I don't care who you are.
If you breathe a word of what you see in here, you will do time for treason. Do you understand me?
translation.it: Se farai parola di quello che vedi qui, ti arresto per tradimento, intesi?

translation.en: I'll take my orders from the Autobots. I know them. I don't know you.
translation.it: Io prendo ordini dagli Autobot, non da lei. Non la conosco.

translation.en: You will.
[Lennox] Sentinel Prime.
These things run on Energon, and he's out of it.
translation.it: Sono alimentati dall'Energon, e lui l'ha finito. È come

translation.en: He's in a sort of a sleep mode.
translation.it: Sono alimentati dall'Energon, e lui l'ha finito. È come in modalità standby.

translation.en: [Optimus] Let us begin.
That's the great Matrix of Leadership.
He holds the only thing in the universe
that can repower a Transformer's spark.
translation.it: che può ripotenziare la scintilla di un Transformer.

translation.en: This is incredible.
Sentinel Prime...
we bid you return.
Hold your fire!
Stop! Sentinel!
It is I, Optimus Prime!
It is all right. You are safe.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, sei al sicuro.

translation.en: There is nothing to fear.
We are here.
You are home, Sentinel.
The war... The war!
[Optimus] The war was lost.
Cybertron is now but a barren wasteland.
translation.it: Cybertron è diventato una distesa desolata.

translation.en: We have taken refuge here, on planet Earth.
translation.it: Ci siamo rifugiati qui sul pianeta Terra.

translation.en: Its human race is our ally.
translation.it: La razza umana è nostra alleata.

translation.en: My ship. We came under fire.
translation.it: La mia nave, siamo stati attaccati.

translation.en: The pillars. Where are the pillars?
translation.it: I pilastri. Dove sono i pilastri?

translation.en: You saved five of them, including the control pillar.
translation.it: Ne hai salvati cinque, incluso il pilastro di controllo.

translation.en: Only five?
We once had hundreds!
[Mearing] Excuse me, gentlemen. May I ask, what is this technology you're looking for?
translation.it: Signori, scusate, qual è la tecnologia in discussione?

translation.en: [Sentinel] It is the ability to reshape the universe.
translation.it: È la capacità di rimodellare l'universo.

translation.en: Together, the pillars form a space bridge.
translation.it: Insieme, i pilastri formano un ponte spaziale.

translation.en: I designed, and I alone, can control it.
translation.it: Io l'ho progettato e solo io posso controllarlo.

translation.en: It defies your laws of physics
translation.it: Sfida le vostre leggi della fisica

translation.en: to transport matter through time and space.
translation.it: e trasporta la materia nel tempo e nello spazio.

translation.en: You're talking about a teleportation device, aren't you?
translation.it: Quindi si tratta di un teletrasporto?

translation.en: Yes, for resources, for refugees.
Refugees, or troops of soldiers, weapons, maybe bombs!
translation.it: Rifugiati o truppe di soldati, armi, perfino bombe!

translation.en: A means of an instant strike! That's its military function, isn't it?
translation.it: Un mezzo di attacco lampo! Non è questa la sua funzione militare?

translation.en: It is our technology, and it must be returned.
translation.it: È la nostra tecnologia e ci deve essere restituita!

translation.en: Yes. If humans say so.
You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere!
translation.it: Non potete far entrare armi di distruzione di massa nella nostra atmosfera!

translation.en: You kind of have to clear customs first!
A little formality called paperwork, kind of separates us from the animals.
translation.it: Una formalità chiamata "burocrazia" che ci distingue dagli animali.

translation.en: I will overlook your condescending tone
translation.it: Sorvolerò sul suo tono di sufficienza,

translation.en: if you heed the gravity of mine.
translation.it: se terrà conto della gravità del mio.

translation.en: The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here.
translation.it: I Decepticon non devono venire a sapere del ponte spaziale.

translation.en: For in their hands,
it would mean the end of your world.
translation.it: significherebbe la fine del vostro mondo.

translation.en: "Total Nightmare" file.
So, the investigation is open. We've sent agents to your office.
translation.it: Abbiamo aperto l'indagine, inviato agenti al tuo ufficio

translation.en: And, for the time being, we're gonna send you home with Autobot protection.
translation.it: e andrai a casa sotto la protezione degli Autobot.

translation.en: Who do I need to speak to to get you guys to understand that I can help, that I can contribute?
translation.it: Con chi devo parlare per farvi capire che posso dare un contributo?

translation.en: Hey, we can all help. Want to tell you what I know? I could tell you about the solar system, all the fun planets to hang out in.
translation.it: Anche noi. Vuoi un consiglio su quale pianeta passare le vacanze?

translation.en: Get off my desk, please.
You pulling out guns? I can't help you out now. She angry.
translation.it: Che pistolona! Non ti posso aiutare. È arrabbiata.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What do you envision for me? I go home now? I go back to work? I make copies? I mean...
translation.it: Che prevedete, torno a casa? Al lavoro? Alle fotocopie?

translation.en: This is a unit for veteran intelligence officers and Special Forces,
translation.it: Questa è un'unità per veterani dell'Intelligence e delle Forze Speciali.

translation.en: not for boys who once owned special cars.
translation.it: Non per ragazzi senza più un'auto speciale.

translation.en: That's a bit harsh, isn't it, ma'am?
Don't call me ma'am. I'm not a ma'am.
Well, you're a woman, aren't you?
So... are those yours?
Yeah. CIA.
I only ask 'cause I also have a medal, from the President.
translation.it: Chiedevo perché anch'io ho una medaglia, dal Presidente.

translation.en: Yeah. Great. So, it's not that complicated, right?
No one gets to work with the Autobots unless I approve it.
translation.it: nessuno lavora con gli Autobot senza che io approvi.

translation.en: You're breaking my chain of command.
translation.it: Tu rompi la mia catena del comando.

translation.en: Come on, let's go. You've done what you came for.
With all due respect, young man, I appreciate what you did. But you're not a soldier.
translation.it: Giovanotto, apprezzo ciò che hai fatto, ma non sei un soldato.

translation.en: You're a messenger. You've always been a messenger.
He's a hero.
Bee, you take the freight elevator. I'll see you up there.
translation.it: Bee, tu prendi il montacarichi, ci vediamo su.

translation.en: This blows. That lady officially kicked us out.
translation.it: Che orrore, la signora ci ha ufficialmente cacciati a calci.

translation.en: Yeah. Witness Protection Program sucks.
Yeah, but we're a whole lot safer with big yellow and his cannons.
translation.it: Sì, ma stiamo più tranquilli col bestione giallo e i suoi cannoni.

translation.en: That dog can't protect crap.
translation.it: Quel cane non protegge un cavolo.

translation.en: [Sam] Bee?
You miss hanging out?
Yeah, me too.
That woman, she called me a messenger.
Can you believe that? After everything I've done, I'm a messenger.
translation.it: dopo tutto quello che ho fatto.

translation.en: I believe it. I tell you, Sammy, we feel the same way.
translation.it: Mi rendo conto, la pensiamo come te.

translation.en: The disrespect on this rock is criminal.
We should do something about it.
Bee, I need to know why they're killing humans.
translation.it: Bee? Devo sapere perché uccidono gli umani. È ora di chiamare l'esperto.

translation.en: I say we call in the expert.
translation.it: Devo sapere perché uccidono gli umani. È ora di chiamare l'esperto.

translation.en: [O'Reilly] My next guest is a former American intelligence operative
translation.it: Il prossimo ospite è un ex operativo dell'Intelligence

translation.en: who has dared to speak out
regarding our alleged military alliance with what many describe
translation.it: riguardo a una nostra alleanza militare con quelli che molti descrivono

translation.en: as a group of extraterrestrial mercenaries.
translation.it: come un gruppo di mercenari extraterrestri.

translation.en: He is the author of the bestselling book, Code-Name Hero.
translation.it: È con noi l'autore del best seller "Nome in Codice: Eroe".

translation.en: Former special agent, Seymour Simmons.
Bill. Big fan. Great to be here.
translation.it: Bill, sei un grande! Grazie dell'invito.

translation.en: Now, Agent Simmons, you would have us believe that it is in our best interest
translation.it: Agente Simmons, lei è convinto che sia la scelta migliore

translation.en: to formally take sides in this so-called alien civil war?
translation.it: schierarci formalmente in questa cosiddetta guerra civile aliena?

translation.en: Well, the other side wanted to spank us for breakfast, so I wouldn't exactly call it a toss-up.
translation.it: Quegli altri volevano distruggerci, quindi non avevamo molta scelta.

translation.en: These Decepticons are lethal.
But polls show half the world would feel safer
translation.it: Ma i sondaggi dicono che il mondo sarebbe più tranquillo

translation.en: with the Autobots completely gone.
translation.it: se gli Autobot se ne andassero.

translation.en: Get them out of here! We don't need them here!
translation.it: Mandiamoli via! Non ci serve averli qui!

translation.en: I feel safer when I sleep with a hand grenade. Doesn't mean I'm always right.
translation.it: Io dormo più tranquillo se ho una bomba a mano. Non significa che ho ragione.

translation.en: Now, agent, here at The Factor, we have obtained documents
translation.it: Agente, qui a Factor abbiamo dei documenti

translation.en: that show you were fired...
translation.it: che dimostrano che lei fu licenziato…

translation.en: -Chaz, I'm doing an interview. -Sorry, Mr. Simmons.
Downsized, Bill. -Budget cuts. Chaz, out. -Your psych evaluation reports
translation.it: Cassintegrato, per i tagli. Chaz, vattene!

translation.en: "severe delusional tendencies."
translation.it: Per una grave forma di tendenza maniacale!

translation.en: This is ambush journalism.
You want the truth about the alien alliance?
Buy my book! Buy my book before it's too late, people!
translation.it: Compra il mio libro! O sarà troppo tardi, popolo!

translation.en: You want a piece of me, Bill? -You want to get naked? I'm ready! -Wow.
translation.it: La vogliamo risolvere, Bill? A mani nude?

translation.en: Interview is over! You!
-You're sounding like a pinhead, agent. -Out of my house! -And I've got a suggestion for you. -It's over. Understand?
translation.it: Lei è un imbecille. Le do un consiglio:

translation.en: -Damage control. -[Simmons] Dutch!
You have obviously upset Mr. Simmons!
translation.it: Avete fatto arrabbiare il signor Simmons!

translation.en: You have 23 seconds to leave the property. I have called the police!
translation.it: Avete 23 secondi per andarvene! Ho chiamato la polizia!

translation.en: You are peasant people throwing rocks at a giant!
translation.it: Siete dei pezzenti che tirano sassi al gigante!

translation.en: What's up next? What have we got?
Book signing, Midtown, noon. Then we pitch your reality show to the Discovery Channel.
translation.it: Firmare libri a mezzogiorno, proporre il suo reality a Discovery Channel.

translation.en: And I have this Witwicky who keeps calling me.
translation.it: C'è anche questo Witwicky che continua a telefonare.

translation.en: Kid? What does he want?
I called you because the Decepticons are back. I want to know why, and I need your help.
translation.it: I Decepticon sono tornati e devi aiutarmi a capire perché.

translation.en: They're back?
Well, that's good for business.
translation.it: Per i miei affari è una pacchia.

translation.en: What if I told you I know a 50-year-old alien secret that nobody ever told you?
translation.it: Se conoscessi un segreto alieno che nessuno ti ha mai detto?

translation.en: Do not tempt my addiction. I have gone through withdrawal, kid.
translation.it: Non mettere alla prova la mia dipendenza. L'astinenza mi uccide.

translation.en: -Dutch, is this line secure? -No.
translation.it: - Dutch, questa linea è sicura? - No.

translation.en: Don't take the risk. I'm rich, why should I?
translation.it: Non rischiare. Sono ricco, perché dovrei?

translation.en: Do not relapse. I won't.
Do not let the demons win.
translation.it: Non darla vinta ai tuoi demoni.

translation.en: Got it.
What kind of secret?
Apollo. Moon. Aliens. Cover-up. Future tech. Assassinations. That kind of stuff.
translation.it: Apollo, Luna, alieni, insabbiamento, tecnologia, assassinii, cose così.

translation.en: [sighs] Apollo.
Tell Megatron, "Let's tango."
translation.it: Dite a Megatron che sono tornato!

translation.en: So majestic and peaceful, this planet.
translation.it: Com'è maestoso e pacifico, questo pianeta.

translation.en: Unlike the final days of Cybertron.
translation.it: Non come gli ultimi giorni di Cybertron.

translation.en: I've wondered what might have been
if you had fought the final battle, instead of me.
translation.it: se ci fossi stato tu alla battaglia finale, al posto mio.

translation.en: Never mourn the past, young warrior.
translation.it: Mai rimpiangere il passato, giovane guerriero.

translation.en: Thanks to you, our race survives.
