translation.it: perché sei l'unico umano di cui si fida, e gli chiederai

translation.en: How does he intend to fight back? Strategies, tactics, everything!
translation.it: che cosa ha intenzione di fare. Strategie, tattiche, tutto!

translation.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
translation.it: Un morso che si sente, molto high-tech.

translation.en: It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear, and it taps your nervous system.
translation.it: Ci fa vedere ciò che vedi, sentire ciò che senti e tocca il tuo sistema nervoso.

translation.en: So, if you so much as try and signal...
translation.it: Se cerchi di inviare un segnale…

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences. I am here because of my father.
translation.it: I rapporti hanno delle conseguenze, io sono qui per mio padre.

translation.en: She is here because of you.
Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
She'll be safe. I give you my word.
translation.it: E si salverà, ti do la mia parola.

translation.en: I'll kill you. You have my word.
translation.it: Ti ucciderò, ti do la mia parola.

translation.en: [Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
translation.it: I Comandi Interforze adesso sono a DEFCON Uno.

translation.en: Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
translation.it: Sono circa 200 i Decepticon ora latitanti.

translation.en: Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
translation.it: I Rilevatori di Energon sono scattati perfino in Sud America e in Cina.

translation.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file.
translation.it: All'ONU hanno ricevuto un file audio cifrato,

translation.en: They say it's from the leader of the Autobots.
translation.it: dicono che è del leader degli Autobot.

translation.en: [Sentinel] Defenders of Earth,
we have come for your natural resources
translation.it: siamo venuti per ricostruire il nostro pianeta

translation.en: to rebuild our damaged planet.
When we have transported all we need, we will leave your world in peace.
translation.it: Trasportato quello che ci serve, lasceremo il vostro mondo in pace.

translation.en: For such peace to exist,
you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.
translation.it: dovete immediatamente esiliare gli Autobot ribelli cui avete dato asilo.

translation.en: Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels.
We await your reply.
[Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy.
translation.it: Non vedo come posso esservi d'aiuto.

translation.en: We could just do this another time, I think.
I have underestimated you at every turn.
translation.it: È incredibile quanto ti abbia sottovalutato.

translation.en: You warned us that they were using humans. And you knew that Sentinel was the key.
translation.it: Ci hai avvisato che usavano degli umani e sapevi che Sentinel era la chiave.

translation.en: [man] Director!
Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.
translation.it: E chi sarò mai? È lei l'esperta. Io sono solo un portatore di rischio.

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating.
translation.it: Sì. - No, stai sudando. - Sto bene, è un sudore nervoso.

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm sweating because I'm nervous.
translation.it: - No, stai sudando. - Sto bene, è un sudore nervoso.

translation.en: I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information.
Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything.
translation.it: e io sono un twitteromane, non tengo un segreto.

translation.en: -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare.
translation.it: e io sono un twitteromane, non tengo un segreto. - Non oserai. - È così.

translation.en: That's the truth. I'm telling you.
Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.
translation.it: Il Pentagono in linea tra 15 minuti.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
translation.it: - Ma che fai? - Niente, tu che fai?

translation.en: Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.it: Qualche momento fa, al Campidoglio è stata approvata una legge

translation.en: Just moments ago, legislation was passed
translation.it: Qualche momento fa, al Campidoglio è stata approvata una legge per esiliare gli Autobot dal territorio americano.

translation.en: to exile the Autobots from American shores.
translation.it: per esiliare gli Autobot dal territorio americano.

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]
translation.it: L'alleanza militare con gli USA è conclusa.

translation.en: In the words of the House Majority Leader, the sponsor of today's resolution, -"We cannot in good conscience..." -[Mearing] Okay.
translation.it: Per citare il leader della maggioranza: "Non possiamo, in tutta coscienza…"

translation.en: What? They can't do this.
translation.it: Cosa? Non possono, glielo dica lei!

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that.
Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
translation.it: Sono alleati, hanno combattuto insieme a noi.

translation.en: And where are we now? Facing an enemy invasion
with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.
translation.it: con un nemico che è infinitamente superiore a noi.

translation.en: If there is any more you know,
anything at all about the enemy's intentions...
now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet.
translation.it: Gli Autobot non sanno come lasciare la Terra.

translation.en: And that is where you're wrong.
translation.it: E qui ti sbagli di grosso.

translation.en: Its name is the Xanthium.
It brought the second wave of Autobots,
translation.it: Ha portato la seconda ondata di Autobot,

translation.en: and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
translation.it: e da allora è gestita e studiata dalla NASA.

translation.en: We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle
translation.it: È agganciata a uno shuttle in disarmo,

translation.en: to maintain military control until they're gone.
translation.it: così avremo il controllo finché se ne andranno.

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque on that itsy-bitsy bolt, not 19!
translation.it: Ci saranno cinque tonnellate di coppia su quel bulloncino, non nove!

translation.en: You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!
translation.it: Metti a repentaglio la vita dei miei amici.

translation.en: These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
translation.it: I Wrecker si occupano della Xanthium.

translation.en: We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.
translation.it: Non li facciamo uscire per quanto sono stronzi.

translation.en: You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker! It's time to kill him!
translation.it: - Tira, mezza sega! - È ora di ucciderlo.

translation.en: I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
[Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
-Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man? -What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring]
I retired from the Air Force.
Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.
translation.it: Sono a contratto per facilitare i rapporti con loro.

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Well, you're not helping!
No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.
translation.it: Non combatto più alieni che mi sparano addosso, un sogno.

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Time to get off this planet.
translation.it: È ora di lasciare questo pianeta!

translation.en: Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?
Where do you think it's taking them? Any planet but here.
translation.it: - Dove andranno adesso? - Su qualunque altro pianeta.

translation.en: I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
translation.it: Voglio parlare con chi comanda qui.

translation.en: Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons. So, I see you survived Washington.
translation.it: Agente Simmons, ex agente Simmons. Sei sopravvissuto a Washington.

translation.en: Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.it: Washington, Egitto, cuore infranto. Sopravvivo, e sopravvivrò.

translation.en: They're bringing everybody in, kid. Putting all the intel on the table.
translation.it: Tirano dentro tutti. Mettendo tutte le carte sul tavolo.

translation.en: And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.it: Se tu pensi che deportare nove Autobot possa risolvere qualche accidenti!

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
Moving up in the world, huh?
translation.it: Ti fai strada nel mondo, eh?

translation.en: Your booty looks excellent.
If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico,
translation.it: Di' una sola parola su quella notte insieme a Quantico,

translation.en: I'll cut your heart out.
You already did.
[Wheelie] Sammy, listen to me. Don't let them exile us.
Don't let them take us, Sam. It's a Decepticon trap.
translation.it: - Facci liberare. - È una trappola dei Decepticon!

translation.en: [Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.
translation.it: Controlla i livelli di azoto! Leviamo le tende da qui.

translation.en: What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.
translation.it: Ciò che dicono i tuoi leader è vero, la colpa è solo mia.

translation.en: I told them whom to trust. I was so wrong.
translation.it: Ho detto loro di chi fidarsi. E mi sbagliavo.

translation.en: That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.
translation.it: Non vuol dire che è colpa tua, ma che sei umano ogni tanto.

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us,
translation.it: potete perdere la fiducia in noi,

translation.en: but never in yourselves.
I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
translation.it: Devo sapere che hai intenzione di fare.

translation.en: I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.it: So che hai una strategia, che tornerai con i rinforzi.

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.it: So che hai una strategia, che tornerai con i rinforzi. Che hai un piano.

translation.en: You can tell me. No other human will ever know.
translation.it: A me puoi dirlo, non lo saprà mai nessun umano.

translation.en: There is no plan.
If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?
translation.it: Se gli obbediamo, come faremo a guardarci allo specchio?

translation.en: You are my friend, Sam.
You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
translation.it: Ma i tuoi leader si sono pronunciati.

translation.en: From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
translation.it: Avanti, scattare! Il lancio è all'alba.

translation.en: We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.
translation.it: Faremo ciò che possiamo. Rendila com'era.

translation.en: You will always be my friend, Sam.
translation.it: Tu sarai sempre mio amico, Sam.

translation.en: I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
translation.it: A distanza di anni, ci chiederanno:

translation.en: "Where were you when they took over the planet?"
translation.it: "Dove eravate, quando hanno conquistato il pianeta?"

translation.en: We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
translation.it: Ti consiglio di considerarla una partnership.

translation.en: You have to stand on the side of progress if you wanna be a part of history.
translation.it: Devi stare dalla parte del progresso se vuoi entrare nella storia.

translation.en: [launch announcer] Seven, six, five,
four, three, two,
one, zero.
Go ahead and throttle up.
translation.it: Portare i motori alla massima potenza.

translation.en: First flight.
You wanted an answer. You got one.
I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.it: Ottengo sempre quello che voglio. Era solo per essere sicuri.

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
translation.it: Di cosa? Che scappassero senza combattere.

translation.en: -[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
translation.it: Ora lavoriamo tutti per i Decepticon.

translation.en: I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone.
translation.it: L'uomo al telefono è il capo delle operazioni umane

translation.en: He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.
translation.it: L'uomo al telefono è il capo delle operazioni umane e tiene Carly in ostaggio.

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
translation.it: Ora tu ti siedi e non ti muovi.

translation.en: Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route. I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.
translation.it: La chiamata è stata fatta in movimento. Entro nella videocamera del cellulare.

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.
translation.it: Quello è uno stream dalla videocamera.

translation.en: Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
translation.it: Sono celle di Chicago. Ci sono.

translation.en: Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
translation.it: Lei ha cercato di aiutarmi. Sarò lì tra 15 ore.

translation.en: [Epps] You're not going alone.
I still got my NEST friends out there.
translation.it: Ho ancora qualche amico del NEST lì.

translation.en: I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.
translation.it: Li raduniamo, troviamo la tua ragazza e mettiamo dentro il tipo.

translation.en: Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
translation.it: Perché quelli erano anche amici miei e li ha uccisi.

translation.en: They said they were here for our resources, to rebuild their planet.
translation.it: Sono venuti per le nostre risorse, per ricostruire il pianeta.

translation.en: Yes, but really one resource in particular.
translation.it: Sì, ma per una risorsa in particolare.

translation.en: One unique to our planet.
translation.it: Una che ha solo il nostro pianeta.

translation.en: Us?
You're very smart. You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.
translation.it: Sei molto sveglia. Non possono ricostruire se non hanno degli schiavi.

translation.en: How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?
translation.it: E quanti mondi in questo universo ne possono offrire sei miliardi?

translation.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
translation.it: Ma che stai dicendo? Non possiamo trasportare uomini.

translation.en: They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
translation.it: Non gli uomini, spostano il loro pianeta qui.

translation.en: [Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here?
[Dylan] Watch. They're spreading hundreds of pillars around the globe right now.
translation.it: Stanno piazzando centinaia di quei pilastri intorno al globo.

translation.en: In just a few hours, they're gonna launch them into orbit
translation.it: Nel giro di qualche ora li lanceranno in orbita

translation.en: and bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
The red one there controls the rest. He triggers that, it starts the whole thing.
translation.it: Il pilastro rosso controlla gli altri. Attivando quello darà il via a tutto.

translation.en: Be gone, insect operative. Your work is done.
translation.it: Va' via, insetto operativo, il tuo lavoro è finito.

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
You want this to happen? I want to survive. I want 40 more years.
translation.it: - È questo che volevi? - Voglio sopravvivere.

translation.en: You think I asked for this? I inherited a client.
translation.it: Credi che me la sia cercata? Ho ereditato un cliente.

translation.en: Yeah, and when Cybertron's here and we're all their slaves, I guess they'll still need a human leader.
translation.it: E quando saremo tutti schiavi, avranno bisogno di un leader umano.

translation.en: Don't jinx me. You want to survive, you listen to me.
translation.it: Non gufarmi. Vuoi sopravvivere? Ascolta solo me.

translation.en: It is time for the slaves of Earth to recognize their masters.
translation.it: È tempo che gli schiavi della Terra riconoscano i loro padroni.

translation.en: Seal off the city.
Get the dogs out of here now! Get them in the back!
translation.it: Portate via i cani! Sul retro.

translation.en: I guess they didn't tell you about this part, did they?
translation.it: Di questo non ti avevano parlato, immagino.

translation.en: -You think I'm at every meeting? -[breathing heavily]
Look, I'm safe.
They said I was safe.
Let's roll!
[Epps] We had a signal earlier.
It's not working.
[newscaster, on radio] This is a national emergency broadcast.
translation.it: Questa è una trasmissione di emergenza.

translation.en: Chicago has suffered a massive attack.
[man] Wrong way!
Get out of here! Go back!
There is a ring of alien ships around Chicago.
translation.it: C'è un anello di navi aliene intorno a Chicago.

translation.en: Our high-range bombers were just knocked out of the sky.
translation.it: I nostri bombardieri sono stati abbattuti come mosche.

translation.en: They can't get through enemy air defenses over the city.
translation.it: Non riescono a penetrare le difese aeree nemiche.

translation.en: Our satellites have been jammed.
We have no way to monitor the enemy's movement.
translation.it: È impossibile monitorare i movimenti nemici.

translation.en: Our old NEST teams are on stand-down holding at Grissom Air Force Base.
translation.it: Le squadre NEST sono in standby alla base aerea di Grissom.

translation.en: We're about ten minutes from the battle zone.
We have Special Forces trying to gain access to the city,
translation.it: Le Forze Speciali cercano di entrare in città.

translation.en: and infantry is staging at the perimeter.
Excuse me, excuse me, it just doesn't make sense!
Can't we get any eyes in there at all?
translation.it: Siamo veramente tagliati fuori del tutto?

translation.en: They keep shooting down our drones.
They want us blind.
But we do have a couple of mini-drones we're gonna try.
translation.it: Ma dobbiamo ancora giocarci la carta dei mini droni.

translation.en: Well, whoever's manning these UAV drones,
translation.it: Chiunque comandi quei droni in remoto, può cercare di ridirigerli

translation.en: can we try to redirect them toward Trump Tower?
translation.it: Chiunque comandi quei droni in remoto, può cercare di ridirigerli verso la Trump Tower? Il piccolo Witwickety sta andando a Chicago.

translation.en: The kid, Witwickety, was on his way to Chicago.
translation.it: verso la Trump Tower? Il piccolo Witwickety sta andando a Chicago.

translation.en: Said some point-man human op is there for the Decepticons!
translation.it: Ha detto che lì c'è un operativo umano che collabora con i Decepticon!

translation.en: Listen, if I know anything, I know this, that kid is an alien-bad-news magnet.
translation.it: Una cosa è certa: il ragazzino è una vera calamita di disgrazie aliene.

translation.en: My God.
We came here to find her in the middle of all that?
translation.it: Siamo venuti a cercarla in mezzo a questo delirio?

translation.en: Are we really going out there, Epps?
I'm not going in there.
No one's going in.
I am.
With or without you, I'll find her.
You're gonna get yourself killed, Sam. Is that what you want?
translation.it: Ti farai uccidere! È questo che vuoi?

translation.en: Is that what you want?
You came all the way out here to get yourself killed? Huh? Listen to what I'm saying.
translation.it: Hai fatto tutta questa strada per farti uccidere?

translation.en: She's here because of me. Do you understand?
Listen, if you go in this building, that's if she's even still alive,
translation.it: Se entri nell'edificio, ammesso che sia viva,

translation.en: there's no way you're gonna be able to reach her!
translation.it: è impensabile che tu possa raggiungerla.

translation.en: What do you suggest I do?
It's over.
I'm sorry, but it's over.
Whoa! Incoming!
We will kill them all.
[Leadfoot] Wreckers, kill him!
[Roadbuster] This is going to hurt!
A lot!
Your leaders will now understand.
Decepticons will never leave your planet alone.
translation.it: I Decepticon non lasceranno mai in pace il vostro pianeta.

translation.en: And we needed them to believe we had gone.
translation.it: E tutti dovevano pensare che ce ne fossimo andati.

translation.en: For today, in the name of freedom,
we take the battle to them!
I saw your ship blow up! The ship?
translation.it: Ho visto la vostra nave esplodere.

translation.en: We were never in the ship! We designed the damn thing, didn't we?
translation.it: Mai saliti sulla nave! L'abbiamo progettata quella maledetta.

translation.en: We were hidden in the first booster rocket to separate.
translation.it: Eravamo nel primo razzo booster che si è separato.

translation.en: Splashed down back in the Atlantic, just as planned.
translation.it: Siamo ammarati nell'Atlantico come da piano.

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
translation.it: Da qui non ce ne andiamo.

translation.en: Yeah, no one's exiling us.
The Autobots are staying right here. We're gonna help you win this war.
translation.it: Gli Autobot resteranno qui. Vi aiuteremo a vincere la guerra.

translation.en: They're surrounding the city to make a fortress,
translation.it: Stanno circondando la città per fare una fortezza,

translation.en: so that no one can see what they're up to inside.
translation.it: così che nessuno possa vedere quello che fanno dentro.

translation.en: Our only chance is the element of surprise.
translation.it: La nostra unica speranza è l'elemento sorpresa.

translation.en: I think I know where to look!
[man] Mini-drone is on approach to Trump Tower.
translation.it: Mini drone in avvicinamento alla Trump Tower.

translation.en: You're telling me Sam's headed into that?
translation.it: Non mi direte che Sam è davvero là.

translation.en: Poor kid.
Probably never got close.
So, you can fly this thing, right?
What is that... What is that? What is that? So-so?
So you so-so can fly this. That feels terrible.
translation.it: Lo sai pilotare così così. Non sei molto affidabile.

translation.en: We're right behind you.
All right, we're going in!
The city is secure.
The humans cannot stop us.
[Sentinel] As the afternoon falls,
the rest of the pillars will reach their launch position.
translation.it: il resto dei pilastri avrà raggiunto la posizione di lancio.

translation.en: [Megatron] This is the victory I promised you so many years ago,
translation.it: Questa è la vittoria da me promessa molti anni or sono.

translation.en: where we rebuild Cybertron together!
I have deigned to work with you...
translation.it: Mi sono abbassato a lavorare con te

translation.en: that our planet may survive!
translation.it: per il bene del nostro pianeta.

translation.en: I will never work for you!
You would be wise to remember the difference.
translation.it: E abbi l'accortezza di ricordare la differenza.

translation.en: [Dylan] Ugh! I'm so sick of this. I'm just sick of waiting.
Where is she?
Where is she?
You've got some balls.
No! No, no!
Jump!
Bee, fire!
Autobots! They're alive! They're here!
Decepticons, defend the pillar!
[Megatron] Raise the bridges! Find them!
You found me.
I'd follow you anywhere.
[soldier] Form a perimeter! Let's go, let's go!
Well, you're crazy.
What is that? Is that us?
[Epps] This thing's a military UAV. Stone, check and see if it's still working.
translation.it: È un drone militare. Stone, controlla se funziona ancora.

translation.en: [Stone] Yeah, it's still got power.
Flight Control, do you copy?
Can... Can you rotate? Can you do something?
translation.it: Potete girare la cam? Potete farlo?

translation.en: I think we got something.
-[Lennox] Epps! We got Epps! -...rotate, something.
[Epps] Come on, work! Work!
All right, turn the volume up on that!
The kid!
Can you rotate or something?
Yes, yes! Okay, okay, okay. They can see us.
Chicago is ground zero, do you understand?
-Can you hear us? You understand? -Witwicky.
Please listen. Sentinel Prime is here, and he has the pillars to his space bridge.
translation.it: Sentinel Prime è qui e ha i pilastri per il suo ponte spaziale.

translation.en: They're on top of a building on Chicago River. It's owned by Hotchkiss Gould Investments.
translation.it: Sono in cima a un palazzo sul fiume, di proprietà della Hotchkiss Gould.

translation.en: Now, the pillar that controls everything is in the southeast cupola.
translation.it: Il pilastro che controlla tutto è nella lanterna di sud-est.

translation.en: You've got to destroy the pillar. You have to shoot down the pillar, or they're going to transport Cybertron here, do you understand?
translation.it: Dovete distruggere il pilastro o trasporteranno Cybertron qui.

translation.en: -Do you understand? -What?
Give me a GPS on the building and on that drone! Let's go!
translation.it: Datemi un GPS sull'edificio e uno sul drone.

translation.en: Mensurate those coordinates. Shorten the kill chain.
[Lennox] Guys on the tarmac, five minutes.
The southeast cupola.
All right!
We need to move before the fighters spot us.
translation.it: Muoviamoci prima che i caccia ci vedano.

translation.en: Wait here until we scout a route ahead.
translation.it: Aspettate qui finché non vi diamo il via libera.

translation.en: -Let's roll. -Ratchet, cover high.
Hey, think we could use that rocket to shoot down the pillar?

translation.en: Not closer. Higher. We need a clear line of sight.
translation.it: Non più vicino. Più in alto. Per avere linea di vista.

translation.en: And it's across the river. Gonna have a hell of a time trying to sneak up.

translation.en: We only got one shot.
One shot's all we need.
[Simmons] We got to be able to see around that building from the ground.

translation.en: Get NSA to send service specs for any cameras in that area.

translation.en: Maybe some are working.
Traffic lights. ATMs. Anything.
[Lennox] Listen up. You want to hit back?
We're gonna have to wingsuit in. It's the only way to get close.

translation.en: I can't promise anyone a ride home, but if you're with me,
translation.it: Non vi prometto che farete ritorno, ma venendo con me,

translation.en: the world needs you now.
I'll find my own ride home, sir.
Who else?
General Morshower, requesting diversionary action to the south of the city.

translation.en: We're coming north and low. You guys drive them to the east.

translation.en: Autobot victory! Autobot victory!

They got my trailer. I need that flight tech.

translation.en: Shockwave can't hunt all of us at once. Wreckers,
translation.it: Shockwave non può inseguirci tutti in una volta. Wrecker!

translation.en: we need a diversion.
Let's get some! You got that right.
Listen, we're gonna circle around to that glass building.

translation.en: And we'll get high enough to make the rocket shot
while you guys draw his fire.

translation.en: Those are boom-sticks. Armed in 30 seconds.
Grapple gloves, for climbing.

Let's go! Run!

29 Bot-busters, 20 piercing D-Bot.

This is not a good idea.

-Hang on! -Take cover!
[Epps] Keep your hands up!

[whispers] Don't move.

Run!

Why do the Decepticons always get the good shit?

We're gonna die!

-I'm swinging that way! -[Hooch] Got her!

Move, move!

Look out!

We'll go this way.

-What a treat! You and me, alone! -Carly!

Okay. He's after me, not you.
Run!

I thought you were working for us, boy?
My eye!
My eye!
Target the Decepticon!
[Carly] Sam!

D-Bots! D-Bots!
I can't see! I can't see!

I'm gonna kill--

translation.en: -How long? -Fifteen.

Get off me!

You simply fail to understand

They happy about something.

Let's give 'em a little ride.

Optimus...
you forget your place!

translation.en: and still you choose humanity.

translation.en: You were the one who taught me freedom is everyone's right.

translation.en: I will retrigger that pillar!

We got Autobots!

Positive surface contact.
-[man] Target I.D. -Target acquired.
Dylan! Wait! No!
Shit! Dylan!
Stop! Stop!

Oh. Have you come to surrender?
-Was it all worth it? -Obviously.
All your work to bring Sentinel back, and now clearly he has all the power.
translation.it: Tanta fatica per recuperare Sentinel e adesso lui ha tutto il potere.

You dare lecture me, slave?

translation.en: It will be me! It will always be me.

translation.en: [Hooch] Rocket!
Die!
You chose sides?
You chose wrong.

...there will only be one!

I love you.
I love you.
You're the only thing I need in this world, and I'll do anything to make it up to you, I promise.

translation.en: I promise.

translation.en: You fought bravely.
There will be days when we lose faith.

translation.en: Days when our allies turn against us.

translation.en: But the day will never come that we forsake this planet

translation.en: and its people.
That's what I call the start of a beautiful future.

translation.en: -Arrest him. -[laughs]
-It was worth it! -Get him out of here!
I'd go to jail for love! I don't care!

translation.en: Go ahead, take me in! I want to go in! Let's go in.
